answers.answer: I dont have any ideas really. I've been trying everything and nothing is working for me. I even had a membrane sweep and still no sign of baby lol. But I just wanted to say I've been induced twice and went into labor on my own once. Honestly I'd almost rather be induced. Based on my personal experience going into labor on my own was the worst pain ever! My contractions were horrible.
The one time I was induced was the easiest... it didn't take as long so I wasnt as tired when it came to push time and then I only needed to push once...
Ok well thats reassuring thanks :) but hopefully ill get to meet him a lil sooner. Where i stay theres a place that sells a labor cocktail maybe ill try that

question: So im 38 weeks today. I have gestational diabetes so they dont want me going to my due date so im being induced in 10 days. Ive heard labor is so much worse when being induced so any ideas on how to get him to come sooner?
title: being induced
